item.title: Small plane crashes near Stump Pass
item.description: The Federal Aviation Administration responded to small plane crash in Englewood, near the stump pass area.

item.title: Road Reopens After Crash backs up traffic on I-75 near Fruitville
item.description: There is no official word of injuries or deaths from this scene.

item.title: Suspicious injuries in crash prompt homicide investigation in Bradenton

item.title: Traffic stop leads to discovery of fentanyl cache
item.description: Lab results received Sept. 18 confirmed the drugs tested positive for fentanyl.

item.title: HCA Blake Hospital adds new treatment for hypertension patients
item.description: The procedure, approved in 2023, lowers blood pressure in patients with resistant hypertension.

item.title: George Hardy, decorated Tuskegee Airman, dies in Sarasota at 100
item.description: His decorations include two Distinguished Flying Crosses, the Legion of Merit, and the Air Medal with multiple oak leaf clusters.

item.title: Hillsborough County jail guard arrested in Manatee, charged with DUI
item.description: She was taken into custody and refused to provide a breath sample, deputies said.

item.title: Couple sentenced to prison for sexual activity with animals, state attorney says
item.description: John White was sentenced to 73.5 months in prison, followed by 84 months of probation.

item.title: Teen who claimed he was shot, kidnapped faked his disappearance, deputies say
item.description: Charges against the teen are being considered.

item.description: A woman died of " significant and serious injuries," Bradenton Police said.

item.title: Sunny skies with little rain for most of the week
item.description: Drier air moves in. Winds get breezy
